mapper.select: SELECT follow_college.id as followCollegeId, college.id as collegeId, college.logo as collegeLogo, college.name as collegeName FROM college,follow_college,user WHERE college.id=follow_college.college_id AND follow_college.user_id=user.id AND user.code=#{code}

INSERT INTO follow_college(user_id, college_id) SELECT (SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}),#{collegeId} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM follow_college WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}) AND college_id = #{collegeId})

INSERT INTO follow_college(user_id, college_id) SELECT (SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}),(SELECT college_id FROM major WHERE id=#{majorId}) FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM follow_college WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}) AND college_id IN (SELECT college_id FROM major WHERE id=#{majorId}))
SELECT id FROM follow_college WHERE college_id=#{collegeId} AND user_id=(select id from user where code=#{code})
